author: rosebank
title: Citizen Promaster Eco-Drive Super Titanium Sapphire BN0241-59W Watch $499 Delivered @ Starbuy
text:
I think this is a great tool watch with great specs. Super Titanium, solar, sapphire, not too thick, and lug-to-lug of only 46mm, despite it being 42mm.
Citizen Promaster Eco-Drive Super Titanium Mens Watch BN0241-59W Green dial with a 42mm case size.
Citizenâ€™s Promaster Land watch BN0241-59W is perfect for high-speed adventurers and has all the tools for the toughest terrain. With Eco-Drive technology, it is powered by light and never needs a battery, so you'll never need to open your caseback or compromise your next adventure again.
Features of the BN0241-59W include a Super Titanium case and bracelet, luminous hour and minute hands, one- piece construction, Duratect MRK and a date function. Water resistant to 200m, the BN0241-59W includes Sapphire crystal glass, a solid case back, screw lock crown and a fold over clasp with a safety button. The case size is 42mm with a thickness of 11.9mm and a lug-to-lug size of 46mm
Citizen Promaster BN0241-59W features the Citizen solar power E168 Japanese movement that has a 6 month power reserve once fully charged.
Rest of the sale:
https://starbuy.com.au/weekend-flash-sale/
